meanings: (생각·감정 등이) disappear, go (away); (갑자기) vanish; (서서히) fade away

vlive.korean: [강한 여운을 남기고 가는 깜짝 손님들] 이러고 사라진다고? [Surprise guests leaving huge impacts] Then they just go? 듣기 View video GOT7 : [GOT2DAY 2019] 10. Mark & Jinyoung
vlive.english: [Surprise guests leaving huge impacts] Then they just go?

vlive.korean: 이게 이렇게 사라진다고 얼굴이. my face disappears. 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 오늘 얼굴은 안 보여요!!!
골든 차일드도 많이 사라진... 사랑해주세요 - 사라진다고요? Give a lot of love to Golden Child. (Said vanished) - We're vanishing? 듣기 View video Golden Child : 골든차일드(Golden Child) Golden Movie #3
vlive.english: Give a lot of love to Golden Child. (Said vanished) - We're vanishing?

vlive.korean: 전복 특유의 맛이 사라진다고 하니까 버터를 조금만 넣기로 했습니다. As they say its flavor may be missing. 듣기 View video T-ARA : 효민이와 Moonlight swimming <달빛 수영>
vlive.english: As they say its flavor may be missing.

vlive.korean: 버터를 많이 넣으면 전복 특유의 향이 사라진다고? Can the unique flavor of abalone disappear with too much butter? 듣기 View video T-ARA : 효민이와 Moonlight swimming <달빛 수영>
vlive.english: Can the unique flavor of abalone disappear with too much butter?

examples.korean: The problem appears at first as a slight misalignment of the teeth, called a malocclusion, that goes away if the habit is stopped. 발음듣기 처음에는 치열이 약간 어그러지는 정도로, 이른바 ‘부정교합(不正咬合)’이라고 말하는 문제가 생기다가, 습관을 고치면 이내 사라진다고 한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The problem appears at first as a slight misalignment of the teeth, called a malocclusion, that goes away if the habit is stopped. 발음

examples.korean: Another tip on dealing with worry in the short term is to change your mental state by changing your physical state, which he says alters your brain chemistry and dispels worry. 발음듣기 걱정에 단기적으로 대처하는 또 한 가지 방법은 신체 상태에 변화를 주어 정신 상태를 변화시키는 것입니다. 그렇게 하면 뇌의 화학 작용이 달라지면서 걱정이 사라진다고 할로웰 박사는 말합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Another tip on dealing with worry in the short term is to change your mental state by changing your physical state, which he says alters your brain chemistry and dispels worry. 발음

examples.korean: Assume that producers vanish in a community. 발음듣기 공동체에서 생산자가 사라진다고 가정해봅시다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Assume that producers vanish in a community. 발음

examples.korean: Students will no longer be penalized for choosing wrong answers, the College Board, the agency in charge of the SAT, announced on Mar. 5. 발음듣기 오답에 대한 감점 제도도 사라진다고 SAT 주관 기관인 칼리지보드가 3월5일 발표했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Students will no longer be penalized for choosing wrong answers, the College Board, the agency in charge of the SAT, announced on Mar. 5. 발음

examples.korean: Many psychiatrists say that the symptoms of depression associated with the holiday season usually lift within a couple of weeks after the holidays end. 발음듣기 많은 정신과 의사들이 휴가철과 연관된 우울증은 보통 휴가가 끝난 몇 주 내에 사라진다고 말한다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Many psychiatrists say that the symptoms of depression associated with the holiday season usually lift within a couple of weeks after the holidays end. 발음
